content.prompt: The first three stanzas (lines 1-15) develop the poem’s overall argument mainly by

choices.label: presenting a series of comparable examples to establish the speaker’s predicament
juxtaposing several metaphors to convey the complexity of the speaker’s despair
referencing an image repeatedly to emphasize the speaker’s determination
using flashback to highlight the gradual development of the speaker’s point of view

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
